bug.short_desc: Cinnamon requires Bluetooth; easy fix proposed
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Hello, I don't use Bluetooth so i removed it right after setting up my PC. However the new version of cinnamon, 3.2.8-14.fc25, REQUIRES to have it.
In the cinnamon.spec, on line 145 & 146: # required for bluetooth applet Requires: cinnamon-applet-blueberry
That means pulling in: [output from 'dnf upgrade']
Installing: blueberry bluez bluez-obexd bluez-tools cinnamon-applet-blueberry gnome-bluetooth gnome-bluetooth-libs libical pulseaudio-module-bluetooth python-setproctitle rfkill sbc wmctrl Aktualization: cinnamon
Please, make it optional. I would preffer using 'Suggests: ' for not installing it at all, but atleast 'Reccomends: ', so I can have Bluetooth packages excluded in /etc/dnf/dnf.conf
